mapper.select: SELECT f.f_code, f.f_date, f.f_redate, f.f_sum, f.f_pname, f.f_spname, f.f_ppath, f.f_psize, f.f_content, f.f_ck, f.f_num, f.s_id, cs.cates_code FROM flea f, cate_sub cs, cate_mid cm, cate_main c WHERE f.s_id = "#{s_id}" AND f.cates_code = cs.cates_code AND cs.catemm_code = cm.catemm_code AND cm.catem_code = c.catem_code AND ROWNUM <= 10;
